actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law

official_title: To amend title 11, United States Code, to provide protections to pensions and other employee benefits in bankruptcy cases.

summary.text: Amends Federal bankruptcy law with respect to employee benefits in bankruptcy cases to declare that an allowed claim by an employee (or former employee) of the debtor for a pension or other employee benefit under a plan to which the employee contributed shall be deemed a secured debt (thus granting such employee a higher priority to collect on the debt).

titles.title: To amend title 11, United States Code, to provide protections to pensions and other employee benefits in bankruptcy cases.
